sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ARMUtilities</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>ARM template ingestion utlities script include</description><name>ARMUtilities</name><script><![CDATA[var ARMUtilities = Class.create();
ARMUtilities.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.constants = new global.CloudTemplateImportConstants();
    },
	
	getTemplateType: function(schema) {
		if (schema.indexOf("deployment") > -1) {
			return "Deployment";
		} else if (schema.indexOf("subscription") > -1) {
			return "Subscription";
		} else if (schema.indexOf("management") > -1) {
			return "Management";
		} else if (schema.indexOf("tenant") > -1) {
			return "Tenant";
		} else {
			return "Unknown";
		}
	},
	
	getType: function(type) {
		type  = type.toLowerCase();
		switch (type){
			case "securestring":
				return this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.SECURESTRING;
			case "int":
				return this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.INT;
			case "bool":
				return this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.BOOL;
			case "object":
				return this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.OBJECT;
			case "secureobject":
				return this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.SECUREOBJECT;
			case "array":
				return this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.ARRAY;
			default:
				return this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.STRING;
		}
	},
	
	getInputParameters: function(templateObj, dynamicInputsHidden,dynamicInputReadOnly) {
		var processedParams = {};
		var inputList = [];
		var noDefaults = [];
		var dynamicDefaults = [];
		var defaults = [];
		var order = 0;

		if (templateObj.parameters) {
			for (var param in templateObj.parameters) {
				var paramValue = templateObj.parameters[param];
				if(param == 'location') {
					param = this.constants.LOCATION_TRANSFORM;
				}
				
				var parameter = {};
				parameter.type = this.getType(paramValue.type);
				parameter.originalType = paramValue.type;
				parameter.source = 'Text';

				if (paramValue.hasOwnProperty('defaultValue')) {
					var defaultValue = paramValue.defaultValue;
					if (parameter.type == 1) {
						if (typeof defaultValue === 'boolean')
							parameter.defaultValue = defaultValue? "Yes" : "No";
						else
							parameter.defaultValue = defaultValue.toLowerCase() == "true"? "Yes" : "No";
					} else
						parameter.defaultValue = (typeof defaultValue === 'string') ? defaultValue : global.JSON.stringify(defaultValue);
				}

				if (paramValue.hasOwnProperty('allowedValues') && parameter.type != 1) {
					parameter.type = this.getType('array');
					parameter.value = global.JSON.stringify(paramValue.allowedValues);
					parameter.source = 'CSVList';
				}
				
				if (paramValue.hasOwnProperty('minValue')) {
					parameter.minValue = paramValue.minValue;
				}
				
				if (paramValue.hasOwnProperty('maxValue')) {
					parameter.maxValue = paramValue.maxValue;
				}
				
				if (paramValue.hasOwnProperty('minLength')) {
					parameter.minLength = paramValue.minLength;
				}
				
				if (paramValue.hasOwnProperty('maxLength')) {
					parameter.maxLength = paramValue.maxLength;
				}

				if (paramValue.hasOwnProperty('metadata')) {
					var metadata = paramValue.metadata;
					var sncMetadata = (metadata.hasOwnProperty('SNC::Parameter::Metadata')) ? metadata['SNC::Parameter::Metadata'] : '';
					if (!gs.nil(sncMetadata)) {
						parameter.regex =  (sncMetadata.hasOwnProperty('allowedPattern')) ? sncMetadata.allowedPattern : '';
						parameter.error_text =  (sncMetadata.hasOwnProperty('ConstraintDescription')) ? sncMetadata.ConstraintDescription : '';
						if (sncMetadata.hasOwnProperty('datasource')) {
							parameter.value = sncMetadata.datasource.replace(/\s+/g, '');
							parameter.source = 'Pools';
						}
					}
				}

				//Catalog variable names must start with a alphabetic character a-z
				var isLetter = this.isCharacter(param.charAt(0));
				if (!isLetter) {
					var firstChar = param.charAt(0);
					param = param.substring(1);
					param = "now_" + firstChar + param;
				}
				parameter.name = param;
				
				//Find inputs with a default value set that are not dynamic template values
				if (!gs.nil(parameter.defaultValue) && parameter.defaultValue.charAt(0) != "[") {
					defaults.push(parameter);
				} else //Find inputs with a default value set that are dynamic template values
				if (!gs.nil(parameter.defaultValue) && parameter.defaultValue.charAt(0) == "[") {
					dynamicDefaults.push(parameter);
				} else {
					noDefaults.push(parameter);
				}
			}
			
			//Sort variable lists based on name in ascending order
			defaults = this.sortByKey(defaults, 'name');
			dynamicDefaults = this.sortByKey(dynamicDefaults, 'name');
			noDefaults = this.sortByKey(noDefaults, 'name');
			
			for (item in noDefaults) {
				noDefaults[item].order = order;
				order++;
			}
			
			for (item in defaults) {
				defaults[item].order = order;
				order++;
			}

			for (item in dynamicDefaults) {
				dynamicDefaults[item].order = order;
				dynamicDefaults[item].readOnly = dynamicInputReadOnly;
				dynamicDefaults[item].hidden = dynamicInputsHidden;
				order++;
			}
			//Set template variable
			var hiddentTemplate = {
				type: this.constants.VARIABLE_TYPE.STRING,
				originalType: 'string',
				source: 'Text',
				defaultValue: JSON.stringify(templateObj),
				name: 'template',
				readOnly: true,
				hidden: true,
				order: order
			};
			dynamicDefaults.push(hiddentTemplate);
			
			var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil();
			inputList = arrayUtil.union(defaults,dynamicDefaults,noDefaults);
		} else {
			return {"nothing":"found"};
		}
		processedParams.input_list = inputList;

		return processedParams;
	},
	
	getUIParameters: function(uiDefinition, variableSetGr, catalogItemGr) {
		if (!gs.nil(uiDefinition.parameters.basics)) {
			var basics = uiDefinition.parameters.basics;
			
			for (basicsItem in basics) {
				//Get real parameter name
				var nameFromOutputs = "[basics('"+basics[basicsItem].name+"')]";
				for (outputItem in uiDefinition.parameters.outputs) {
					if (uiDefinition.parameters.outputs[outputItem] == nameFromOutputs) {
						basics[basicsItem].name = outputItem;
					}
				}
				if (basics[basicsItem].label.constructor === ({}).constructor) {
					basics[basicsItem].label = basics[basicsItem].label[Object.keys(basics[basicsItem].label)[0]];
				}
				
				if (basics[basicsItem].toolTip.constructor === ({}).constructor) {
					basics[basicsItem].toolTip = basics[basicsItem].toolTip[Object.keys(basics[basicsItem].toolTip)[0]];
				}
				
				this.updateVariableFromUIDefinition(catalogItemGr, basics[basicsItem].name, variableSetGr,basics[basicsItem].label, basics[basicsItem].toolTip, basics[basicsItem].constraints.required, basics[basicsItem].constraints.validationMessage,basics[basicsItem].constraints.regex);
			}
		}
		
		//Parse Steps Array
		if (!gs.nil(uiDefinition.parameters.steps)) {
			gs.info("TIMTEST - Found " + uiDefinition.parameters.steps.length +" step(s)");
			var steps = uiDefinition.parameters.steps;
			for (stepsItem in steps) {
				gs.info("TIMTEST - Looping through step name: " + steps[stepsItem].name);
				var elements = steps[stepsItem].elements;
				for (elementsItem in elements) {
					//Get real parameter name
					nameFromOutputs = "[steps('"+steps[stepsItem].name+"')."+elements[elementsItem].name+"]";
					var alternativeNameFromOutputs = "[steps('"+steps[stepsItem].name+"')."+elements[elementsItem].name+".name]";
					gs.info("TIMTEST: element nameFromOutputs: " + nameFromOutputs);

					for (outputsItem in uiDefinition.parameters.outputs) {
						if (uiDefinition.parameters.outputs[outputsItem] == nameFromOutputs) {
							gs.info("TIMTEST - Found matching variable name in output object for variable: " + elements[elementsItem].name);
							elements[elementsItem].name = outputsItem;
						} else if (uiDefinition.parameters.outputs[outputsItem] == alternativeNameFromOutputs) {
							gs.info("TIMTEST - Found matching alternative variable name in output object for variable: " + elements[elementsItem].name);
							elements[elementsItem].name = outputsItem;
						}
					}
					if (elements[elementsItem].label.constructor === ({}).constructor) {
						elements[elementsItem].label = elements[elementsItem].label[Object.keys(elements[elementsItem].label)[0]];
					}

					if (elements[elementsItem].toolTip.constructor === ({}).constructor) {
						elements[elementsItem].toolTip = elements[elementsItem].toolTip[Object.keys(elements[elementsItem].toolTip)[0]];
					}
					this.updateVariableFromUIDefinition(catalogItemGr, elements[elementsItem].name, variableSetGr,elements[elementsItem].label, elements[elementsItem].toolTip, elements[elementsItem].constraints.required, null, null);
				}
			}
			
		}
	},
	
	updateVariableFromUIDefinition: function(catalogItemGr, variableName,variableSetGr,variableLabel, variableToolTip, variableRequired, validationMessage, validationRegex) {
		var isLetter = this.isCharacter(variableName.charAt(0));
		if (!isLetter) {
			var firstChar = variableName.charAt(0);
			variableName = variableName.substring(1);
			variableName = "now_" + firstChar + variableName;
		}
		if(variableName == 'location') {
			variableName = this.constants.LOCATION_TRANSFORM;
		}

		var variableGr = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.VARIABLE);
		variableGr.initialize();
		variableGr.addQuery('variable_set', '' + variableSetGr.sys_id);
		variableGr.addQuery('name',  variableName);
		variableGr.query();
		var update = variableGr.next();
		if (!gs.nil(variableLabel)) {
				variableGr.question_text = variableLabel;
		}

		if (!gs.nil(variableToolTip)) {
			variableGr.tooltip = variableToolTip;
		}

		if (!gs.nil(variableRequired)) {
			variableGr.mandatory = variableRequired;
		}
		if (update){
			result = variableGr.update(); 
		} else{
			gs.info("TIMTEST - ERROR - Cannot update variable from UIDefinition. Variable record is missing");
		}
		
		if (!gs.nil(validationMessage)) {
			//Only update validation if the regex is valid.
			try {
				var test = new RegExp(validationRegex);
				this.updateValidation(catalogItemGr.name, variableGr, variableSetGr.sys_id, validationMessage, validationRegex);
			} catch(e) {
				gs.warn("Invalid regex found in UIDefinition payload. Skipping validation catalog script update for variable: " + variableGr.name, "Azure Template Importer");
			}
			
		}	
	},
	
	sortByKey: function(array, key) {
		return array.sort(function(a, b) {
			var x = a[key]; var y = b[key];
			return ((x < y) ? -1 : ((x > y) ? 1 : 0));
		});
	},
	
	isCharacter : function(firstCharacter) {
		if (typeof firstCharacter !== 'string') {
			return false;
		}

		return firstCharacter.toLowerCase() !== firstCharacter.toUpperCase();
	},
	
	getOutputParameters : function(outputObj) {
		var outputAttributes = {};
		if (outputObj) {
			Object.keys(outputObj).forEach(function(val) {
				outputAttributes[val] = val + '.value}';
			});
			return Object.keys(outputAttributes).length > 0 ? global.JSON.stringify(outputAttributes) : '';
		}
		return {"nothing":"found"};
	},
	
	upsertVariable : function(variableSet, catalogItem, parameter){
		var variable = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.VARIABLE);
		variable.initialize();
		variable.addQuery('variable_set', '' + variableSet);
		variable.addQuery('name',  parameter.name);
		variable.query();
		var update = variable.next();
		variable.name = parameter.name;
		variable.type = parameter.type;
		variable.description = "SYSTEM GENERATED. DO NOT MODIFY. Template Parameter Type: " + parameter.originalType;
		variable.order = '' + parameter.order;
		variable.variable_set = variableSet;
		
		//Create clean question text for form. split by case change and capitalize
		var tempQuestion = parameter.name.replace('now_','').replace('template_location','location');
		var tempArray = tempQuestion.match(/[A-Z]?[a-z]+|[0-9]+|[A-Z]+(?![a-z])/g);
		for(var i = 0 ; i < tempArray.length ; i++){
			//Capitalize first character of each new string
			tempArray[i] = tempArray[i].charAt(0).toUpperCase() + tempArray[i].substr(1);
		}

		tempQuestion = tempArray.join(" ");
		variable.question_text = tempQuestion;
		variable.mandatory = true;
		variable.default_value = parameter.defaultValue;
		
		if (!gs.nil(parameter.hidden) && parameter.hidden == true) {
			variable.hidden = true;
		} else {
			variable.hidden = false;
		}
		
		if (!gs.nil(parameter.readOnly) && parameter.readOnly == true) {
			variable.read_only = true;
		} else {
			variable.read_only = false;
		}
		

		if (variable.type == 25) {
			variable.mask_use_confirmation = true;
			variable.mask_use_encryption = true;
		}
		
		var result = false;
		if (update){
			result = variable.update(); 
		} else{
			result = variable.insert();
		}

		if(result && parameter.source ==  'CSVList') {
			var choiceValues = parameter.value+"";
			this.clearQuestionChoices(result);
			this.addQuestionChoicesToVariable(result,choiceValues);
		}

		if (!result){
			gs.info("Cannot update/insert variable with parameter " + new global.JSON().encode(parameter) );
			return null;
		}
		
		if(parameter.minValue || parameter.maxValue || parameter.minLength || parameter.maxLength) {
			this.upsertOnChangeScript(catalogItem.name,variable,parameter.minValue,parameter.maxValue,parameter.minLength,parameter.maxLength,variableSet);
		}

		return variable;
	},
	
	upsertVariableSet : function(catalogItem, setName, order) {
		var io_set_item_gr = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.IO_SET_ITEM);
		io_set_item_gr.addQuery('sc_cat_item', '' + catalogItem);
		io_set_item_gr.addQuery('variable_set.name', '' + setName);
		io_set_item_gr.setLimit(1);
		io_set_item_gr.query();
		var variableSet = null;
		if(io_set_item_gr.next()) {
			var variable_set_gr = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.VARIABLE_SET);
			variable_set_gr.addQuery('sys_id', io_set_item_gr.variable_set);
			variable_set_gr.setLimit(1);
			variable_set_gr.query();
			if ( variable_set_gr.next() ){
				variableSet = this.updateVariableSet(variable_set_gr.sys_id, order);
			} else {
				variableSet = this.createVariableSet(setName, order, catalogItem);
				this.createIoSetItem(catalogItem, variableSet.sys_id);
			}
			io_set_item_gr.deleteRecord();
		} else {
			variableSet = this.createVariableSet(setName, order, catalogItem);
			this.createIoSetItem(catalogItem, variableSet.sys_id);
		}
		return variableSet;
	},
	
	createVariableSet : function(setName, order, catalogItem){
		var variableSet = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.VARIABLE_SET);
		variableSet.initialize();
		variableSet.name = setName;
		variableSet.display_title = false;
		variableSet.title = gs.getMessage('{0}', setName);
		variableSet.order = order;
		variableSet.layout = '2across';
		variableSet.description    = '';
		variableSet.insert();
		return variableSet;
	},
	
	createIoSetItem : function(catalogItem, variableSet) {
		var setGr = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.IO_SET_ITEM);
		setGr.initialize();
		setGr.variable_set = variableSet;
		setGr.sc_cat_item = catalogItem;
		setGr.insert();
	},
	
	clearQuestionChoices : function(variableId) {
		var questionChoiceGr = new GlideRecord("question_choice");
		questionChoiceGr.addQuery("question",variableId);
		questionChoiceGr.deleteMultiple();
	},
	
	addQuestionChoicesToVariable : function(variableId, choiceValues) {
		choiceValues = choiceValues.replace("[\"","").replace("\"]","").replace(",\"",",").replace("\",",",");
		var array = choiceValues.split(",");
		
		//Remove leading and trailing quotes
		for (choice in array) {
			array[choice] = array[choice].replace(/^"|"$/g, '');
		}
		
		var order = 10;
		for(var index in array ){
			var value = 	array[index];
			var questionChoiceGr = new GlideRecord("question_choice");
			questionChoiceGr.question = variableId;
			questionChoiceGr.text = value;
			questionChoiceGr.value = value;
			questionChoiceGr.order = order;
			questionChoiceGr.insert();
			order += 10;
		}
	},
	
	validateVariableValue : function(parameterValue, variable_sys_id, catItemName) {
		var variableGr;
		if (catItemName) {
			variableGr = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.VARIABLE);
			variableGr.addQuery("name", variable_sys_id);
			variableGr.addQuery("cat_item.name", catItemName);
			variableGr.query();
			variableGr.next();
		} else {
			variableGr = new GlideRecord(this.constants.TABLE.VARIABLE);
			variableGr.get(variable_sys_id);
		}

		var paramDisplayValue = variableGr.question_text;
		var templateVariableType = variableGr.description.split("Template Parameter Type: ")[1];
		var retVal = {name: '' + variableGr.name, isValid:true, message: [], msgtype: 'info' ,sysID : ''+variableGr.getUniqueValue()};

		//validate if variable type is String, Password, Boolean
		if (variableGr.type == 6 || variableGr.type == 25
			|| variableGr.type == 2 || variableGr.type == 1 || variableGr.type == 5 || variableGr.type == 10 || variableGr.type == 18 || variableGr.type == 4 || variableGr.type == 16 || variableGr.type == 22) {
			var errmsg;
			if (parameterValue) {
				errmsg = this._validateParamValue(parameterValue, variableGr, paramDisplayValue, templateVariableType);
			}

			if (errmsg && errmsg.length > 0) {
				retVal.isValid = false;
				retVal.message = errmsg;
				retVal.msgtype = 'error';
			}
		}
		return retVal;
	},
	
	_validateParamValue : function(parameterValue, paramGr, paramDisplayValue, paramtype){
		var errmsg = [];
		parameterValue = parameterValue +'';
		if (paramtype === 'string' || paramtype === 'secureString') {
			//this._validateAllowedValues(parameterValue, paramGr.allowed_values, errmsg);
			this._validateAllowedPattern(parameterValue, paramGr.regex+'', errmsg, paramDisplayValue);
			if (paramGr.type == 10)
				this._validateDateTime(parameterValue, errmsg);
		} else if (paramtype === 'int') {
			if (this._isInt(parameterValue)) {
				var numValue = parseFloat(parameterValue);
				this._validateAllowedValues(numValue, paramGr.allowed_values, errmsg);
			} else {
				errmsg.push(gs.getMessage("This is not a valid integer"));
			}
		} else if (paramtype === 'bool') {
			if (!this._validateIsBoolStr(parameterValue)) {
				errmsg.push(gs.getMessage("This is not a valid boolean"));
			}
		} else if (paramtype === 'array') {
			if (!new CmpJSONUtil().isValidArray(parameterValue))
				errmsg.push(gs.getMessage("This is not a valid JSON array"));
		} else if (paramtype === 'object') {
			if (!new CmpJSONUtil().isValidObject(parameterValue)) {
				errmsg.push(gs.getMessage("This is not a valid JSON object"));
			}
		}

		if (errmsg.length > 0) {
			if (paramGr.constraint_description)
				errmsg.splice(0, 0, '' + paramGr.constraint_description);
		}
		return errmsg;
	},
	
	_isInt : function(value) {
		return !isNaN(parseInt(value, 10)) && (parseInt(value, 10) == parseFloat(value));
	},
	
	upsertOnChangeScript: function(catalogItemName, variableGr, minValue, maxValue, minLength, maxLength, variableSetId) {
		var logicContent = '';
		if (!gs.nil(minValue) && !gs.nil(maxValue)) {
			logicContent = 'var myInt=parseInt(newValue);if(myInt<'+minValue+'|| myInt>'+maxValue+'){g_form.clearValue("'+variableGr.name+'");g_form.showFieldMsg("'+variableGr.name+'","Please enter a value >= '+minValue+' and <= '+maxValue+'"';
		} else if (!gs.nil(minValue)) {
			logicContent = 'var myInt=parseInt(newValue);if(myInt<'+minValue+'){g_form.clearValue("'+variableGr.name+'");g_form.showFieldMsg("'+variableGr.name+'","Please enter a value >= '+minValue+'"';
		} else if (!gs.nil(maxValue)) {
			logicContent = 'var myInt=parseInt(newValue);if(myInt>'+maxValue+'){g_form.clearValue("'+variableGr.name+'");g_form.showFieldMsg("'+variableGr.name+'","Please enter a value <= '+maxValue+'"';
		} else if (!gs.nil(minLength) && !gs.nil(maxLength)) {
			logicContent = 'if(newValue.length<'+minLength+' || newValue.length>'+maxLength+'){g_form.clearValue("'+variableGr.name+'");g_form.showFieldMsg("'+variableGr.name+'","Must be between '+minLength+' and '+maxLength+' in length"';
		} else if (!gs.nil(minLength)) {
			logicContent = 'if(newValue.length<'+minLength+'){g_form.clearValue("'+variableGr.name+'");g_form.showFieldMsg("'+variableGr.name+'","Must be a minimum of '+minLength+' in length"';
		} else if (!gs.nil(maxLength)) {
			logicContent = 'if(newValue.length>'+maxLength+'){g_form.clearValue("'+variableGr.name+'");g_form.showFieldMsg("'+variableGr.name+'","Must be a maximum of '+maxLength+' in length"';
		}
		
		var changeScript = 'function onChange(control,oldValue,newValue,isLoading){if(isLoading||newValue==""){return;}' + logicContent + ',"error",false);}}';
		
		var formattedName = catalogItemName.replaceAll(" ","_") + '_' + variableGr.name;
		formattedName = formattedName.toLowerCase();
		
		var scriptGr = new GlideRecord('catalog_script_client');
		scriptGr.initialize();
		scriptGr.addQuery('name', formattedName);
		scriptGr.query();
		var update = scriptGr.next();
		scriptGr.name = formattedName;
		scriptGr.ui_type = 10;
		scriptGr.type = "onChange";
		scriptGr.applies_to = "set";
		scriptGr.variable_set = variableSetId;
		scriptGr.cat_variable = 'IO:'+ variableGr.sys_id;
		scriptGr.script = changeScript;
		
		var result = false;
		if (update){
			result = scriptGr.update(); 
		} else{
			result = scriptGr.insert();
		}
	},
	
	updateValidation: function(catalogItemName, variableGr, variableSetId, validationMessage, validationRegex) {
		var formattedName = catalogItemName.replaceAll(" ","_") + '_' + variableGr.name;
		formattedName = formattedName.toLowerCase();
		var scriptGr = new GlideRecord('catalog_script_client');
		scriptGr.addQuery('name', formattedName);
		scriptGr.query();
		var update = scriptGr.next();
		var logicContent = 'var re = /' + validationRegex + '/;if(!re.test(newValue)){g_form.clearValue("'+variableGr.name+'");g_form.showFieldMsg("'+variableGr.name+'","'+validationMessage+'"';
			var changeScript = 'function onChange(control,oldValue,newValue,isLoading){if(isLoading||newValue==""){return;}' + logicContent + ',"error",false);}}';
			
		scriptGr.name = formattedName;
		scriptGr.ui_type = 10;
		scriptGr.type = "onChange";
		scriptGr.applies_to = "set";
		scriptGr.variable_set = variableSetId;
		scriptGr.cat_variable = 'IO:'+ variableGr.sys_id;
		scriptGr.script = changeScript;
			
		if (update){
			result = scriptGr.update(); 
		} else{
			result = scriptGr.insert();
		}
	},
	
    type: 'ARMUtilities'

CloudTemplateImportConstants.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.LOCATION_TRANSFORM = 'template_location';
		this.VARIABLE_TYPE = {
			STRING : 6, //Multi Line Text
			INT : 6, //Single Line Text
			BOOL : 1, //Yes/No
			OBJECT: 2, //Multi Line Text
			ARRAY : 5, //Select Box
			SECURESTRING : 25, //Masked
			SECUREOBJECT : 2 //Masked
		};
		
		this.TABLE = {
			VARIABLE : 'item_option_new',
			IO_SET_ITEM : 'io_set_item',
			VARIABLE_SET : 'item_option_new_set'
		};
    },
    type: 'CloudTemplateImportConstants'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 16:28:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>cf48668e87870dd01882bae6dabb3567</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CloudTemplateImportConstants</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cf48668e87870dd01882bae6dabb3567</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-06 17:30:01</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
